title: Technical Issue.
body: I was playing lol then I was kicked out of the game.... I tried reconnecting but it said my firewall was blocking the program. I resolved the issue with my firewall but it still says my firewall is blocking the program. I'm stuck in the reconnect menu and can't seem to get out. Help anyone?

replies.body:
If League was able to connect before, and then it wasn't able to afterward, then it's not likely your firewall to blame (unless its settings change automatically). The error message says it's your firewall because Riot didn't really think League wouldn't connect for any other reason/it can't find any other reason.

Just to make sure, however, try uninstalling (if applicable) your firewall. Disabling it actually doesn't do much if it's still installed. Do the same to your anti-virus. Then test League with a custom game. If it's still not working, then you know it's neither of those.

While you do that, can you tell me what ISP and OS you're on?
